title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for chatting with Ollama models; built with Go and Charm libraries.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; same generate/chat/embed API as Python/JS clients.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async streaming and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models from BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama chat/completions inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI commands (summarize, rewrite, translate) via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin for running Ollama prompts on blocks or entire pages.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray AIR integration to scale Ollama inference across a Ray cluster.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Drop-in FastAPI micro-service that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama.
